text:
Has anyone tried to use hubdb dynamic pages in reports? From what I can tell, those pages don't appear and only the parent page is attirbuted in reports.

This is causing a headache and we've been told that in order to achieve what we want, we would have to scrap all our hubdb pages and recreate them as normal pages, and it's not really a sensible option seeing the number of pages there are.

Looking to create a redirect from www to non-www domain with some issues.

The account has two domains, a primary and a secondary the primary domain is already using the www redirect function so it can't be reused, is there another way to create  a www redirect within the HubSpot ecosystem that is functional?

I was thinking maybe the api, but I was hoping some of the experts in here may have some knowledge to drop on me.
Anybody else having trouble with accessing published apps through their dev account? I get an error when trying to access my app but I can't reach anyone at HubSpot to help.
